reference.shortdesc: A subscript is text that is printed below the line. It is frequently used in chemical and mathematical formulas.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The content of the sub element is typically rendered lower in relationship to the surrounding text and in a smaller font.
The subscript component is typically rendered lower in relationship to the surrounding text and in a smaller font.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The sub element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the highlighting-domain module.
